title: Parents are paying $2500 to falsify vaccine records. It’s endangering babies like Riley
desc: Australian parents are boasting about paying anti-vaccine nurses to falsify Medicare records of their children, putting lives at risk, an investigation has revealed.

title: Mombasa Gold Scam: DCI Nabs 2 Suspects Over KSh 37 Million Fraud Targeting US Investor
desc: Detectives at Nyali Police arrest two suspects linked to a KSh 37m gold scam, defrauding a US investor. Investigations reveal ties to a larger fraud syndicate.

title: High Court orders IGP to clarify whereabouts of missing NUP leader
desc: Kampala, Uganda | THE INDEPENDENT | The High Court in Kampala has ordered the Inspector General of Police (IGP) to clarify whether the police are holding National Unity Platform (NUP) Vice President for Western Region, Jolly Tukamushaba. The directive was issued by Justice Joyce Kavuma on Friday while hearing an application filed by Tukamushaba’s lawyers, …

title: Truck in Thailand hits power lines, toppling 70 poles and causing widespread blackout
desc: BANGKOK: A container truck in Thailand struck power lines while driving onto a bridge on Jan 30, causing a power outage stretching 2km.

title: Wood cops Q3 disqualification for New Zealand Grand Prix
desc: Ryan Wood will start the New Zealand Grand Prix from the back of the field after being officially disqualified from the final segment of qualifying. - Australia's #1 motorsport news website - Speedcafe.com

title: Mozambican national arrested in connection with DJ Warras' murder
desc: The Gauteng Serious and Violent Crimes Unit has arrested a second suspect in connection with the murder of Warrick “DJ Warras” Stock.
